DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetic patient ; Diabetes duration =/ > 1 year ; HbA1c ~ 7,5 % ; Recent onset DM ; BMI < 18 OR > 35 kg/m2 ; T2DM ; History major heart/renal disease ; Severe untreated proliferative retinopathy ; History recurrent severe hypoglycaemia ; ( History ) brain disorder ; Alcohol abuse , ( History ) drug abuse , benzodiazepine , selective betablockers , oral steroid , oral anticoagulant ; Current psychiatric disease/treatment ; ( history ) eating disorder ; History severe head trauma accompany loss consciousness ; Any endocrine disease well control least 3 month ; Inability undergo MRI ; Visual acuity < 0.3 ; Known suspect allergy trial product relate product
